original_text: And Noah builded an altar unto the Lord; and took of every clean beast, and of every clean fowl, and offered burnt offerings on the altar.
korean_text: 노아가 여호와께 제단을 쌓고 모든 정결한 짐승과 모든 정결한 새 중에서 제물을 취하여 번제로 제단에 드렸더니

sentences.original_text: And Noah builded an altar unto the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 노아는 주를 위해 제단을 쌓았고

sentences.original_text: and took of every clean beast
and offered burnt offerings on the altar
